analysis.key_quote: Schedule F” (now renamed Schedule Policy/Career) reduces our country’s democratic republic’s greatness and institutional knowledge, 250 years in making, to that of a third-rate country led by a self-serving tinhorn dictator intent on revenge against those individuals loyal to the country over him.
analysis.rationale: The comment expresses strong opposition to the proposed rule by highlighting concerns about the loss of institutional knowledge and the potential for politicization, framing the rule as detrimental to the integrity of the democratic system.
